title: Access to capped RNAs by chemical ligation
content:
RSC Chem. Biol., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4CB00165F, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
Karolina Bartosik, Ronald Micura
A practical approach to generate mRNA 5′-fragments with clicked triazole linkages in the backbone is presented.
To cite this article before page numbers are assigned, use the DOI form of citation above.
